generated_text:
- road: The cobblestone surface in the foreground and extending into the background is a road, as it is the area where vehicles are present and drive.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian walkway is visible on the right side of the street, bordered by curbs and buildings, indicating it is designated for pedestrians.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with windows, doors, and commercial signage are visible along the street, confirming their presence.
- vegetation: Green foliage, including bushes and possibly trees, is visible on the left side of the image and partially obscuring the view.
- car: A green van is parked on the left side of the street, identifiable as a car due to its continuous body shape and vehicle features.
- pole: Small, cylindrical bollards are visible on the road, serving as barriers or delineators, which are vertical poles.
- traffic sign: A white sign with text and graphics is standing on the sidewalk near the center of the image, which is a traffic sign.
- person: A person is visible standing near the entrance of a shop on the right side of the image, partially obscured by the building's entrance.
